com.threerings.gwt.ui
Class StyledTextPanel

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.threerings.gwt.ui.StyledTextPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasHandlers, EventListener
public class StyledTextPanel
extends Widget

Formats user supplied text based on a simple, wiki-like markup syntax.

Constructor Summary
StyledTextPanel(String plainText)
          Parses incoming (untrusted) text, and builds up a DOM tree around markup, keeping the untrusted text rendered only as text (not as HTML).

Constructor Detail

StyledTextPanel

public StyledTextPanel(String plainText)
Parses incoming (untrusted) text, and builds up a DOM tree around markup, keeping the untrusted text rendered only as text (not as HTML). This class extends Widget instead of Panel in order to prevent arbitrary additions of other Widgets.
